name: Ring, Disc, and Sphere
procedure: Hold the starting block near the top of the inclined plane so that it blocks all three objects from rolling.
Quickly move the starting block away from you and up to start the objects rolling down the incline.
Notice that the order of finish is sphere, disc and then ring.
